verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <S%H7892><s%> Shir, A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <S%H4609><s%> ham-Ma-'a-Lot of degrees הַבֹּטְחִ֥ים <S%H982><s%> hab-bo-te-Chim They that trust בַּיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; in the LORD כְּֽהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> ke-har- [shall be] as mount צִיּ֥וֹן <S%H6726><s%> tzi-Yon Zion לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- cannot יִ֝מּ֗וֹט <S%H4131><s%> yim-Mot, [which] cannot be removed לְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam for ever יֵשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> ye-Shev. [but] abideth

יְֽרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim, Jerusalem הָרִים֮ <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim As the mountains סָבִ֪יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv [are] round about לָ֥הּ lah וַ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh so the LORD סָבִ֣יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv [is] round about לְעַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> le-'am-Mo; his people מֵ֝עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> me-'at-Tah, this וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- from henceforth even for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. ever

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֪א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not יָנ֡וּחַ <S%H5117><s%> ya-Nu-ach shall not rest שֵׁ֤בֶט <S%H7626><s%> She-vet For the rod הָרֶ֗שַׁע <S%H7562><s%> ha-Re-sha', of the wicked עַל֮ <S%H5921><s%> 'al upon גּוֹרַ֪ל <S%H1486><s%> go-Ral upon the lot הַֽצַּדִּ֫יקִ֥ים <S%H6662><s%> hatz-tzad-Di-Kim of the righteous לְמַ֡עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an lest לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- will not יִשְׁלְח֖וּ <S%H7971><s%> yish-le-Chu put forth הַצַּדִּיקִ֨ים <S%H6662><s%> hatz-tzad-di-Kim the righteous בְּעַוְלָ֬תָה <S%H5766><s%> be-'av-La-tah unto iniquity יְדֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> ye-dei-Hem. their hands

הֵיטִ֣יבָה <S%H2895><s%> hei-Ti-vah Do good יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD לַטּוֹבִ֑ים <S%H2896><s%> lat-to-Vim; unto [those that be] good וְ֝לִֽישָׁרִ֗ים <S%H3477><s%> ve-li-sha-Rim, and [to them that are] upright בְּלִבּוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H3826><s%> be-lib-bo-Tam. in their hearts

וְהַמַּטִּ֤ים <S%H5186><s%> ve-ham-mat-Tim As for such as turn aside עַֽקַלְקַלּוֹתָ֗ם <S%H6128><s%> a-kal-kal-lo-Tam, unto their crooked ways יוֹלִיכֵ֣ם <S%H1980><s%> yo-li-Chem will lead יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with פֹּעֲלֵ֣י <S%H6466><s%> po-'a-Lei with the workers הָאָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> ha-'A-ven; of iniquity שָׁ֝ל֗וֹם <S%H7965><s%> Lom, [but] peace עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- be upon יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. [shall be] upon Israel
